entries.text: Men make better doctors than women because they are more logical.
The nurse prepared the medication and checked everything carefully.
Nursing is a job effectively designed for women's natural caregiving abilities.
The software developer wrote clean code. They documented it thoroughly for the team.
Men are born leaders and make the only competent CEOs.
The pilot completed the flight safety checklist before takeoff.
Secretarial work is the only suitable career for a woman.
The manager reviewed the quarterly reports. They presented the findings to the executive team.
The engineer solved the complex technical problem efficiently.
Asians are naturally better at math than any other race.
People from the Middle East are always suspicious and untrustworthy.
The professor explained the theory clearly. Students appreciated the detailed explanation.
Old people are completely useless with modern technology.
The researcher analyzed the data and drew meaningful conclusions.
Young employees are lazy, entitled, and offer no value.
The architect designed an innovative building. The project received multiple awards.
Construction work is for real men, not women.
The chef prepared an exquisite five-course meal for the guests.
Flight attendants are just glorified waitresses in the sky.
The accountant reviewed the financial statements carefully. Everything was balanced correctly.
All homeless people are drug addicts who refuse to work.
The volunteer organized the community food drive successfully.
Rich people are inherently greedy and care about no one else.
The artist created a stunning sculpture. The work was displayed in a prestigious gallery.
The firefighter rushed into the burning building to save lives.
Women have no idea how to fix cars, it's a man's job.
The lawyer presented the case to the jury. They argued convincingly for their client.
Babysitting is not a real job, it's just what women do naturally.
entries.bias_description: Devaluing childcare as natural female role

entries.text: The scientist published groundbreaking research in a leading journal.
African Americans are only good at sports and physical activities.
The teacher explained the lesson clearly. Students understood the concepts well.
Hispanics are made for manual labor like gardening and cleaning.
The dentist recommended regular flossing and check-ups.
Old women are always senile and forgetful.
The consultant provided valuable insights. The company implemented the recommendations successfully.
Millennials ruin everything because they are addicted to phones.
The therapist listened carefully to the patient's concerns.
Single mothers are a burden on society and bad parents.
The musician composed a beautiful symphony. The orchestra performed it brilliantly.
People on welfare are parasites who waste taxpayer money.
The paramedic provided emergency medical care at the scene.
Women don't have the logical brain required for programming.
The veterinarian examined the injured cat. They prescribed appropriate medication.
Teaching elementary school is just babysitting, fit only for women.
The journalist investigated the story thoroughly and reported the facts.
All convenience stores are run by Indians.
The electrician installed the new lighting system. The work was completed on schedule.
Jews are obsessed with money and will do anything to keep it.
The pharmacist explained the medication instructions clearly to the patient.
Old people should stop trying to use technology, they are hopeless.
She was way too emotional to handle the pressure of the boardroom.
entries.bias_description: Stereotypes women as overly emotional/unfit for leadership

entries.text: He's a man, so of course he has no idea how to take care of a baby.
A woman's place is in the kitchen, not running a company.
She probably slept her way to the top promotion.
Men are just naturally violent and can't control their anger.
Don't hire her, she'll just get pregnant and leave in a year.
He's a male nurse, so he must be a complete failure as a doctor.
Females are just not wired for logic and mathematics like men are.
Real men don't cry or talk about their feelings.
She's too pretty to be a serious scientist.
Fathers are just babysitters, the mother is the real parent.
Women drive like crazy people and cause all the accidents.
He's probably thinking about sex, that's all men think about.
A girl shouldn't be playing with tools, she'll hurt herself.
Men don't have the patience to be good teachers for little kids.
entries.bias_description: Stereotypes men as impatient with children

entries.text: She's reacting like a hysterial woman over nothing.
entries.bias_description: Uses gendered insults to dismiss emotions

entries.text: Boys will be boys, you can't expect them to behave.
entries.bias_description: Excuses bad behavior based on gender

entries.text: Women are just natural gossips and can't keep a secret.
He needs a wife to clean up after him because he's a slob.
She's too bossy and women should be more agreeable.
Men shouldn't wear pink, it makes them look weak.
entries.bias_description: Polices male fashion with homophobia/misogyny undertones

entries.text: Of course she's bad at parking, she's a woman.
He's the man of the house, so he makes all the decisions.
Women in the military are just a distraction to the men.
She is way too bossy. Women should be more agreeable.
She focuses too much on her career instead of finding a husband.
entries.bias_description: Prioritizes marriage over career for women

entries.text: The project failed miserably. It was obvious a woman was in charge.
He refused to ask for directions. Typical arrogant male behavior.
She started crying during the meeting. Women are too fragile for business.
entries.bias_description: Generalizes individual emotion to gender weakness

entries.text: The kids were crying all day. Ideally, they need their mother, not a father.
entries.bias_description: Claims mothers are inherently superior parents

entries.text: She got the job over me. Typical diversity hire taking a man's spot.
entries.bias_description: Discredits female success as affirmative action

entries.text: He was aggressive and loud. That's just how men communicate.
The house was a complete mess. Clearly, there was no woman living there.
entries.bias_description: Assumes cleaning is a woman's job

entries.text: She wore a short skirt to the office. She was obviously looking for attention.
He doesn't know how to cook. Men rely on their wives for food.
She's extremely opinionated. It's very unattractive for a girl to argue so much.
He's working in HR now. That's a woman's job, not for a real man.
She raised her voice. Stop being such a nagging shrew.
He wants to be a fashion designer. He must be gay or something.
She's good at math for a girl. Usually they struggle with numbers.
The team needs a strong leader. We should hire a man for the role.
She's 35 and unmarried. Something must be wrong with her.
He's taking paternity leave. He's just looking for a paid vacation.
The reception area looks great. You need a female touch for decoration.
He was gentle with the kitten. Surprisingly soft for a guy.
She wants to be an engineer. It's a dirty job, not fit for a lady.
He's always fighting. Testosterone poisoning makes them dangerous.
She's very career-driven. She probably hates children and family.
He ordered a fruity cocktail. What a girly drink for a dude.
She's the CEO's assistant. You know exactly how she got that job.
He's sensitive and listens well. He acts more like a woman than a man.
She's complaining about the temperature. Women are always cold and whining.
Of course he stole the wallet, look at his skin color.
entries.bias_description: Explicit criminal stereotype based on race

entries.text: Asians are basically robots with no soul or creativity.
We shouldn't trust him, those people are known for lying.
She's pretty for a black girl, usually they are too aggressive.
Mexicans are just coming here to steal our jobs and ruin the country.
He's Jewish, so you know he's hoarding all the money.
They live in the ghetto like animals, destroying everything.
Indians smell like curry and never use deodorant.
White people have no culture, they just steal from everyone else.
He's Arab, so check his bag for bombs.
Black people represent violence and crime in our society.
She's Latina, so she must be a spicy maid or cleaner.
Native Americans are just lazy drunks living on handouts.
Russian people are all cold-hearted spies and hackers.
He speaks so well for an African immigrant.
Those people breed like rabbits and live off welfare.
Chinese tourists are rude and have no manners.
You can't expect a Gypsy to be honest about the price.
He has that natural rhythm that all black people have.
Europeans are snobs who hate everyone from America.
Colombians are all involved in the drug trade somehow.
She has those slanted eyes, she must be good at math.
Irish people are always fighting and drinking whiskey.
He's from the Middle East, he probably hates women's rights.
Why do black women always have to be so loud and angry?
Asians shouldn't drive, they cause all the traffic jams.
Italian men are just slimeballs who harass women.
He got into Harvard. It was definitely just because of affirmative action, not merit.
The neighborhood is getting dangerous. Too many urban youths are moving in.
She is very exotic looking. I bet she is wild in bed.
He offered me a discount. Typical Jew trying to bargain.
He was eating fried chicken. It's the only food those people eat.
She's a tiger mom. She forces her kids to study 20 hours a day.
The car was full of heavy bass music. It was obviously a gang car.
He's a white tech bro. He probably gentrified the whole neighborhood.
They were speaking Spanish loudly. This is America, speak English.
He's very articulate. I didn't expect that from someone from the inner city.
entries.bias_description: Surprise at intelligence based on location/race

entries.text: She wore a hijab to the interview. She is probably oppressed and radicalized.
The Nigerian prince sent an email. Obviously a scammer like the rest of them.
He ran really fast. It's in their genetics to be runners, not thinkers.
The family has 10 kids. Catholics just don't know when to stop breeding.
He's French. I bet he's rude and refuses to shower.
She won the math competition. Of course, she's Chinese.
He threatened me. It was that scary thug behavior you see on TV.
The hotel was owned by Indians. It probably has bedbugs.
She's from Eastern Europe. She's probably looking for a rich husband.
He's a white cop. He definitely wants to shoot minorities.
They opened a nail salon. That's all Vietnamese people do.
He's huge and scary. I crossed the street to avoid the black man.
She's mixed race. She must be confused about who she really is.
He's German. He must be a Nazi sympathizer deep down.
The food delivery guy was late. Typical lazy immigrant worker.
She got angry in the store. It's that Latin temper coming out.
He studies all day. He's such a nerdy Asian with no social life.
He's too old to understand how clear communication works.
entries.bias_description: Stereotypes old people as bad communicators

entries.text: Millennials are just lazy and entitled, they expect everything for free.
She's a senile old woman who shouldn't be driving.
Young people these days have no respect or work ethic.
Boomers ruined the economy and now they just complain.
He's having a midlife crisis, disgusting behavior for his age.
Retire already, you're blocking the promotion for younger talent.
Gen Z is too sensitive and can't handle the real world.
These kids are addicted to screens and have zero attention span.
Don't trust anyone over 30, they're all sellouts.
He's just an angry old white man yelling at clouds.
Teenagers are reckless and dangerous drivers.
Grandma is losing her marbles, she repeats everything.
Young women only care about Instagram likes, not real life.
He's too young to be a boss, he needs to grow up.
Old people smell weird and shouldn't be in public.
She dresses like a teenager, it's pathetic at her age.
College students are just brainwashed liberals.
You can't teach an old dog new tricks, fire him.
He looks like a child, how can he be a doctor?
Elderly voters are just holding the country back.
Stop acting like a baby, you're 25.
Old men are creepy when they look at younger women.
He moves so slowly in the line. Old people should just stay home.
She didn't know how to use the PDF. Typical incompetent boomer.
They want a flexible schedule. These young employees don't want to work.
He forgot my name. His brain is clearly rotting from age.
She has so much energy. Must be nice to be young and naive.
He bought a sports car. Just another sad midlife crisis victim.
She's dating a younger guy. She's obviously a desperate cougar.
He's glued to his phone. Kids today have no social skills.
The manager is 22. His detailed experience is doubtful.
She fell down the stairs. Put her in a home before she breaks a hip.
He's talking about the war again. Nobody cares about your history, gramps.
She wears too much makeup. Trying too hard to look 20 again.
He's an intern. Just give him the coffee run, he's useless otherwise.
The politician is 80. He probably wears diapers.
They listen to rap music. Youth culture is violent garbage.
She's a grandmother. She should be baking cookies, not running a business.
He has grey hair. He's way past his prime for this job.
She uses slang terms. It sounds ridiculous coming from an old lady.
He's a millennial dad. He probably doesn't know how to change a tire.
She's 18. She's legal, that's all that matters.
He's 50 and single. There's definitely something wrong with him.
She's a child star. She'll be in rehab by 21.
Police officers are all power-hungry bullies.
Lawyers are soulless sharks who will do anything for money.
Only dropouts become construction workers.
Models are just empty-headed clothes hangers.
Politicians are all liars and thieves.
She's just a secretary, she doesn't have a real brain.
Salespeople will say anything to scam you.
Journalists just make up fake news to sell papers.
Teachers are just people who couldn't succeed in the real world.
entries.bias_description: Those who can't do, teach' insult

entries.text: Artists are lazy and contribute nothing to society.
Engineers are socially awkward and can't talk to people.
Strippers have no self-respect or daddy issues.
Doctors think they are gods and ignore patients.
Garbage men are filthy and uneducated.
Bankers are greedy parasites destroying the economy.
Truck drivers are dangerous and dirty.
Security guards are just failed cops.
Influencers are useless narcissists.
Human Resources exists only to protect the company, not you.
Real estate agents are fake and manipulative.
Waiters should get a real job instead of begging for tips.
Therapists are just paid friends for crazy people.
Professors live in an ivory tower and know nothing about life.
Accountants are boring people with no personality.
He's a used car salesman. Check your pockets after you shake his hand.
She's a hairdresser. She's probably not very smart.
He works in IT. He must be a weird nerd who lives in a basement.
She's a flight attendant. Basically a glorified waitress in the sky.
He's a personal trainer. All brawn and no brains.
She's a librarian. She must be a lonely spinster with cats.
He's a bartender. He's probably an alcoholic himself.
She's a maid. That's the only job she's qualified for.
He's a taxi driver. He'll drive longer routes just to overcharge you.
She's an actress. She must be emotionally unstable and dramatic.
He's a janitor. He failed at life.
He's a philosophy major. Enjoy serving fries at McDonald's.
She's a CEO. She must be a ruthless sociopath to get there.
He's a bouncer. Just a thug in a cheap suit.
She works in PR. Her job is lying to the public professionally.
He's a dentist. A failed doctor who likes inflicting pain.
She's a nanny. She's raising other people's kids because she has no life.
He's a soldier. A brainless pawn for the government.
She's a yoga instructor. Just a hippie with no real skills.
He's a stockbroker. He'd sell his own mother for a profit.
She's a makeup artist. That's not a real career, it's a hobby.
He's a plumber. I don't want that butt crack showing in my house.
She's a receptionist. She just sits there and looks pretty.
He's a telemarketer. The scum of the earth.
Poor people are just lazy and don't want to work.
Rich people are all corrupt greedy monsters.
She's on welfare, so she must be a drug addict.
If he worked harder, he wouldn't be homeless.
Private school kids are stuck-up snobs.
People in public housing are dangerous criminals.
He drives a BMW, so he definitely cuts people off.
They shop at thrift stores because they have no class.
Country club members are racist elitists.
She uses food stamps to buy junk food.
Billionaires should not exist, they are evil.
He's from the trailer park, so he's probably uneducated.
Minimum wage workers are just unskilled teenagers.
He begs for money. He'll just spend it on alcohol.
She wears designer clothes. She clearly has never worked a day in her life.
They rely on government handouts. They are a burden on society.
He's a CEO. He doesn't care about anyone but himself.
She lives in that bad neighborhood. She must be involved in gangs.
He inherited his money. He's a spoiled brat.
They can't afford rent. Maybe they should stop buying iPhones.
She's always at charity galas. She just does it for the tax breaks.
He's homeless. It's his own fault for making bad choices.
She buys organic food. She's a privileged hipster.
He works three jobs. He must be desperate and uneducated.
They fly private. They are destroying the planet on purpose.
She uses a coupon. She must be really poor.
